Article.title: Article
Article.description: An article about activity that is being carried through in the realm of OER.

Action.description: An action / project that is being carried through in the realm of OER.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: A service used in an Action.

Person.title: Person
Person.description: A person serving or working with Open Educational Resources.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: An institution serving or working with Open Educational Resources.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: An event that is being held for/by members of the OER community.

Product.title: Tool
Product.description: A tool used to implement OER services

Grant.title: Grant
Grant.description: A grant awarded to a project

Place.title: Place
Place.description: An location description consisting of an address and/or geo data

LikeAction.title: Like action
LikeAction.description: An action indicating that an agent likes an object

agent.description: The agent of the like action

object.description: The object of the like action

LighthouseAction.title: Lighthouse action
LighthouseAction.description: An action indicating that an object is considered a lighthouse by an agent

agent.description: The agent of the like action

object.title: LighthouseAction.object
object.description: The object of the like action

Country.title: Country
